participant_2.background:
I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i draw comics.
i am a student in social sciences.
my favorite color is green.

content.text: Hey, it's going well! I'm watching a funny TV show right now.
That's great! I'm just hanging out with my dog.
Oh, what kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever mix. His name is Buddy.
Aww, golden retrievers are so cute!
Yeah, he's the best. What are you studying in social sciences?
I'm studying sociology. I'm really interested in learning about how people interact with each other.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always been interested in sociology, but I never took any classes in it.
It's a really interesting field! You should check it out sometime.
I will! What's your favorite thing about drawing comics?
I love being able to express myself creatively. I also love the challenge of coming up with new and interesting stories.
That's great! I can definitely see how drawing comics would be a fun way to express yourself.
